mapper.select: select m.*, p.id as project_id, p.name as project_name, u.id as creater_id, u.chinese_name as creater_chinese_name, u.english_name as creater_english_name from t_module m left join t_project p on m.project_id = p.id left join t_user u on u.id = m.creater_id where m.id = #{moduleId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_module (name, project_id, creater_id) values (#{name}, #{projectId}, #{createrId})
